description: EssentialContactsContact is the Schema for the EssentialContactsContact API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: EssentialContactsContactSpec defines the desired state of EssentialContactsContact

email.description: Required. The email address to send notifications to. The email address does not need to be a Google Account.

folderRef.description: FolderRef represents the Folder that this resource belongs to.

external.description: The 'name' field of a folder, when not managed by Config Connector. This field must be set when 'name' field is not set.

name.description: The 'name' field of a 'Folder' resource. This field must be set when 'external' field is not set.

namespace.description: The 'namespace' field of a 'Folder' resource. If unset, the namespace is defaulted to the namespace of the referencer resource.

languageTag.description: Required. The preferred language for notifications, as a ISO 639-1 language code. See [Supported languages](https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/managing-notification-contacts#supported-languages) for a list of supported languages.

notificationCategorySubscriptions.description: Required. The categories of notifications that the contact will receive communications for.

organizationRef.description: OrganizationRef represents the Organization that this resource belongs to.

external.description: The 'name' field of an organization, when not managed by Config Connector.

projectRef.description: The Project that this resource belongs to.

external.description: The `projectID` field of a project, when not managed by Config Connector.

kind.description: The kind of the Project resource; optional but must be `Project` if provided.

resourceID.description: The EssentialContactsContact name. If not given, the metadata.name will be used.

validateTime.description: The last time the validation_state was updated, either manually or automatically. A contact is considered stale if its validation state was updated more than 1 year ago.

status.description: EssentialContactsContactStatus defines the config connector machine state of EssentialContactsContact

conditions.description: Conditions represent the latest available observations of the object's current state.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown.

type.description: Type is the type of the condition.

externalRef.description: A unique specifier for the EssentialContactsContact resource in GCP.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the generation of the resource that was most recently observed by the Config Connector controller. If this is equal to metadata.generation, then that means that the current reported status reflects the most recent desired state of the resource.

observedState.description: ObservedState is the state of the resource as most recently observed in GCP.

validationState.description: Output only. The validity of the contact. A contact is considered valid if it is the correct recipient for notifications for a particular resource.
